item.title: Advice From an Open-Source Hiring Manager
item.description: In Decemeber of 2014 I transitioned from fifteen years of being a developer into being one of the people managers on a really amazing team here at Red Hat. All told, my first year in this role has been a tremendous learning experience for me. If you are interested in becoming a part of a team like this one, here is some advice for you based on the dozens of interviews I have conducted over my first 15 months.

item.title: New Challenges, New Tools
item.description: I almost feel like a traitor, which is a weird way to feel about consumer electronics. But my next laptop is not going to be a MacBook.
